Montessorı, Waldorf, Froebel, EmIllıa ve: Montessorı, Waldorf, Froebel, EmIllıa and Vıllage Instıtutes
Bu duyduğunuz isimler dünya çapında okul: These names you have heard are schools and models that have contributed to the preschool education system worldwide.
Each one puts the child at the center.
Çocukları çağının ihtiyaçlarını karşılay: They qualify children to meet the needs of their age.
Aynı zamanda spiritüel olgunluğa da eriş: They are also a school of spiritual maturity.
Eğitim sistemi tarih boyunca revizyona u: As the education system has been revised throughout history, each model has added new principles to the previous one, creating a movement.
Kendi eğitim sistemimizde ise tüm dünyad: In our own education system, we have a system that has attracted the attention of education authorities all over the world and has even been the subject of study tours:
Cumhuriyet dönemi sonrası kısa sürede yu: The village institutes are our own school that brought development to every part of the country in a short period of time after the Republican era.
Bu durumda bizler, çocuklarımız için uyg: In this situation, we are aware that the system we will implement for our children must be constantly updated. And what they all have in common is that we, too.
Özel Bademli Anaokulu olarak öz eğitim f: As Private Bademli Kindergarten, our goals, which constitute our core educational philosophy, are an eclectic summary of these schools;
Monitör eğitimci ve lider öğretmenlik mo: Monitor educator and teacher leader model
Ve tüm bu eğitim dinamiklerimizin hayat: And for all these educational dynamics to come to life,
GÜVENLİ VE ÖZENLİ BİR AİLE SICAKLIĞI…: A SAFE AND CARING FAMILY ATMOSPHERE...
Günümüzü şekillendiren teknolojileri, iç: Have you ever thought that the brains that created the technologies that shape today, the cities we live in, the revolution in medicine, were kindergarten age 20-30 years ago?
Nasıl bir dünyada, nasıl bir yaşam sürec: In what kind of world, what kind of life will we live?
İşte tüm bunlar bizim yola çıkarken hiss: These were the foundations of the excitement and belief we felt when we set out. We know that their tiny hands, big hearts and sharp minds will change the world. And we are here to give them the best for a good start.
Okulumuzda tek bir prensip var…: There is only one principle in our school...
“Çocuklarımız için en iyi olan ne ise d: “What is best for our children is the right thing to do.”
Keşfetmeyi, öğrenmeyi ve beceriler kazan: To be an institution that can make exploring, learning and acquiring skills a happy act.
Özel Bademli Anaokulu, dünyaya entegre o: Özel Bademli Anaokulu aims to raise universal citizens who can integrate into the world and embrace Atatürk's principles and revolutions.
“En Önemlisi Sensin, Kalabalıklarda Kayb: “You are the most important, don't get lost in the crowd!”
Özel Bademli Anaokulu’nda okul öncesi eğ: A child who completes the preschool education program at Private Bademli Kindergarten;
Sosyal beceriye sahip birey haline gelir: Becomes an individual with social skills.
Yetişkinler ve akranlarıyla etkili ileti: Communicates effectively with adults and peers.
Gains love for people, animals and nature.
Çevreye ve doğaya saygılı bir birey hali: Becomes an individual who respects the environment and nature.
Psikomotor becerileri edinir ve spor yap: Acquires psychomotor skills and gains the habit of doing sports.
Kişisel sınırlarını bilir ve öz bakım be: Knows personal boundaries and acquires self-care skills.
Sağlıklı ve düzenli beslenme alışkanlığı: Gains healthy and regular eating habits.
Sınıflama, sıralama, nesneleri farklılık: Learns to classify, sort, group objects according to their differences and similarities.
Anlama, algılama, yordama ve yorumlama k: Gains the ability to understand, perceive, predict and interpret.
Paylaşmanın ve hoşgörülü olmanın değerin: Understands the value of sharing and being tolerant.
Understands the importance of respect and love.
Liderlik ve problem çözme yetisi kazanır: Gain leadership and problem solving skills.
Atatürk’ün önemini bilir ve Atatürk sevg: Recognizes the importance of Atatürk and gains love for Atatürk.
Çocuğun çevresini ve dünyayı anlama yoll: These are activities and events that help the child's ways of understanding the world and their environment to become effective.
Evrensel iletişim araçlarına sahip olabi: Activities and events that help us to have universal communication tools.
Çocukların psiko-motor becerileri yapabi: Our activities and events that support children's psycho-motor skills and the maturation of the relevant body parts and organs.
Çocukların sahip oldukları bilişsel pota: Activities and activities that help children to reveal their cognitive potential.
Çocukların genel yaşam kalitesini artıra: These are events and activities that improve children's overall quality of life and help them adopt an organized lifestyle.
Bizler okulumuzda haftanın her günü nati: In our school, every day of the week, we are working on the process of acquiring English with great sensitivity with our native speaker English teacher.
Devamında ise akşamları evimizde bizim i: Then, in the evenings, we practice online at home with our I Speak Better platform teachers.
Çocuk gelişiminde zihinsel ve fiziksel g: We are not enslaved by devices such as smart boards, touch screens, tablets, etc., which have a negative impact on mental and physical development in child development.
Gelişim sürecinde bizler, ince kaslar ve: In the development process, we include the child in all activities and events by taking the child to the center in the education and acquisition process that will provide progress in fine muscles and related skills.
Özel Bademli Anaokulu gerek fiziksel şar: Özel Bademli Anaokulu carries out an extremely meticulous attention process with its physical conditions and interest and care.
Butik bir okulun tüm avantajlarını mümkü: By making all the advantages of a boutique school possible, it follows an individual and intensive attention policy that does not allow our children to get lost in the campus crowds.
Hem binamız hem de bahçemiz yani tüm yaş: Both our building and our garden, that is, all your living spaces, are under 24/7 observation and monitored with a serious selective permeability sensitivity.
Çoklu Zeka Kuramı ile Çocuklarımızı Çok: We Discover Our Children Very Well with Multiple Intelligence Theory
Çoklu Zeka kuramı ilkelerini sınıflarımı: One of our main tasks is to associate the principles of Multiple Intelligence theory with the methods, methods and strategies we use in our classrooms.
Çoklu Zeka kuramının ilkelerini dikkate: By taking into account the principles of Multiple Intelligence theory, we ensure that children take a more active role in the learning process and support them to be happy by doing things in a way that they can enjoy.
Tüm zeka alanlarına seslenen şekilde etk: We work to prepare activities that appeal to all areas of intelligence and to help children gain knowledge, skills, attitudes and values by using all their intelligences.
Çocukların bireysel farklılıklarının far: Being aware of the individual differences of children, we strive to guide them in the learning process, to provide cognitive support, to prepare various activities by considering all of their intelligences, and to encourage students to develop creative and critical thinking.
“Yaşam matematiksel ve sözel etkinlikler: “Life is too colorful and rich to be limited to mathematical and verbal activities. There is a very important point that should not be forgotten, and that is the fact that people should never be labeled with an intelligence quotient. Because one of the most important principles of the Theory of Multiple Intelligences is that intelligences have a constant dynamism of development.”
